==Chinese==
{{zh-forms|alt=𠁦,𠁧,𠁩,𠔈,𠔗}}

===Glyph origin===
{{Han etyl}}

{{liushu|p}} – a vertical stroke {{zh-l|*丨}} passing throught the center of {{zh-l|*口}}, indicating the center. Originally a pictograph of a string [[heddle]]: {{och-l|綜}}. It is also interpreted as a flagpole piercing the middle of a frame or an arrow in the center of a target.

===Etymology===
From {{inh|zh|sit-pro|*t/duŋ}}. Cognate with {{cog|bo|གཞུང||middle, center}}.

====Definitions====
{{zh-hanzi}}

# [[middle]]; [[center]]
# [[medium]]; [[intermediary]]
#* {{zh-x|這 件 夾克 有 三 個 尺碼：小、中、大。|You can get the jacket in three sizes - small, '''medium''' and large.}}
# [[within]]; [[among]]; [[in]]
#* {{zh-x|受傷 者 中 有 一 位 15 歲 的 女孩。|A 15-year-old girl was '''among''' the injured.}}
# [[while]]; in the process of; [[during]]; in the middle of
#* {{zh-x|他 在 事故 中 受傷。|He was injured '''in''' the accident.}}
#* {{zh-x|她 出生 在 一 場 暴風雨 中。|She was born '''in the middle of''' a rain storm.}}
# {{lb|zh|dialectal}} [[all right]]; [[OK]]
# {{zh-short|中國|[[China]]; [[Chinese]]}}
#* {{zh-x|^中 ^美 關係|'''China'''–United States relation}}
# {{zh-short|中學|[[middle school]]}} ''Used only in the abbreviation of the name.''
#: {{zh-x|三{Sān} 中{Zhōng}|No.3 Middle School}}
# {{surname|lang=zh}} Zhong

#: 大'''中'''小
#:: large, '''medium''' and small

===Etymology 3===
{{ja-kanjitab|うち|yomi=k}}

====Pronunciation====
{{ja-pron|yomi=k|うち|acc=0|acc_ref=DJR,NHK}}

====Noun====
{{ja-noun|うち}}
: ''{{l|ja|内}} ({{l|ja|うち}}, uchi)''
: ''{{l|ja|裡}} ({{l|ja|うち}}, uchi)''

: 内 is the most common [[kanji]] for this [[pronunciation]].
# [[inside]]

===Proper noun===
{{ja-pos|ちゅう|proper}}

# short form for [[China]] or [[Chinese]], [[Sino-]] (prefix)
#: {{ja-usex|lang=ja|日中関係|^にっちゅう かんけい|Sino-Japanese relations}}

{{ja-pos|あたり|proper}}

# {{surname|lang=ja|sort=あたり}}

{{ja-pos|あたる|proper}}

# {{given name|female|lang=ja|sort=あたる}}

===Suffix===
{{ja-pos|じゅう|suffix}}

# [[during]], in the course of, [[throughout]]
#: {{ja-usex|世界'''中'''|せかい'''じゅう'''|'''throughout''' the world}}
#: {{ja-usex|体'''中'''|からだ'''じゅう'''|'''throughout''' the body}}
# [[all over]], everywhere

{{ja-pos|ちゅう|suffix}}

# being in the process of doing
#: {{ja-usex|ダウンロード'''中'''|ダウンロード-'''ちゅう'''|download'''ing'''; download '''in progress'''}}
#: {{ja-usex|メンテ'''中'''|メンテ-'''ちゅう'''|'''currently in''' maintenance}}

The distinction between {{m|ja|じゅう|tr=jū}} and {{m|ja|ちゅう|tr=chū}} can be somewhat confusing: {{m|ja|じゅう|tr=jū}} means ''throughout,'' in ''all'' places, as in {{m|ja|一日中||all day long|tr=ichinichijū}} or {{m|ja|体中||throughout the body|tr=karadajū}}, while {{m|ja|ちゅう|tr=chū}} means ''within,'' but not ''everywhere,'' as in {{m|ja|授業中||in class, during class|tr=jugyōchū}}. Contrast “I worked on this ''all day long''” with “I worked on this ''in class'' (but not necessarily for the entire time)”.
